/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The predominant colors are shades of gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements.
